content: Which American author's story, The Fall of the House of Usher, has been adapted into numerous films and inspired countless horror writers?

Ah, that's a great question! The American author you're referring to is Edgar Allan Poe. He wrote "The Fall of the House of Usher" in 1839, and it's one of his most famous works. Poe is known for his dark and macabre stories, and this particular tale has indeed been adapted into numerous films and has inspired countless horror writers over the years. His influence on the genre is immense, and his works continue to be studied and enjoyed by people all around the world.
